import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/mlab/Project/courseProject/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import _objectSpread from"/Users/mlab/Project/courseProject/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{COLLECTION_ADD_ITEM,COLLECTION_REMOVE_ITEM,COLLECTION_CLEAR_ITEMS}from"../Constants/CollectionConstants";export var collectionReducer=function collectionReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{collectionItems:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case COLLECTION_ADD_ITEM:var item=action.payload;var existItem=state.collectionItems.find(function(i){return i.product===item.product;});if(existItem){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{collectionItems:state.collectionItems.map(function(i){return i.product===existItem.product?item:i;})});}else{return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{collectionItems:[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state.collectionItems),[item])});}case COLLECTION_REMOVE_ITEM:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{collectionItems:state.collectionItems.filter(function(i){return i.product!==action.payload;})});//Add COLLECTION TAG
case COLLECTION_CLEAR_ITEMS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{collectionItems:[]});default:return state;}};
